item.description: So…, I find I used these codes a lot, and they are very helpful for effectivity. Assign files into different folders # Assuming I have 230 files in db_folder, and I want to copy these 230 files into different folders (folder0, folder1 and so on) with at least 50 files in each folder. files_list contains names of these 230 files, like files_list=["file1", "file2", ..., "file230"] import shutil chunks = [files_list[x:x+50] for x in range(0, len(files_list), 50)] # len(chunks) = 5 for i in range(53): chunk = chunks[i] newpath = "db_folder/folder" + str(i) if not os.
